custom-sql.sql: SELECT pml_attachedfile.* FROM pml_attachedfile WHERE (lower(attachedfilecode) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(attachedfilename) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM pml_attachedfile WHERE (lower(attachedfilecode) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(attachedfilename) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
